profile.title: Personal Profile
profile.content: Hello, I'm Tianxin. I love programming and technological innovation, and I'm committed to continuously improving my skills and knowledge. I believe that continuous learning and practice are the keys to growth.

education.title: Education
education.description: Focused on computer science and related technology fields

traits.title: Personal Traits
traits.content: I have strong learning ability and problem-solving skills, and I like to challenge myself and constantly break through. In teamwork, I can communicate effectively and actively contribute my ideas.

items.title: Project Development Experience
items.description: Participated in the development of multiple frontend projects, using React to build user interfaces and optimize user experience.
achievements: Optimized application performance and improved loading speed
Collaborated with teams to complete large-scale projects

achievements: Learned best practices and design patterns

interview.title: Interview Tips
interview.description: Here are some excellent frontend interview resources and learning materials to help you better prepare for technical interviews.

resources.title: Vue3 Interview Questions
resources.description: Vue3 related interview questions and knowledge summary, covering core concepts and practical experience.

resources.title: Frontend Interview Collection
resources.description: Comprehensive frontend interview question collection, covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frameworks and more.

resources.title: Frontend Interview Video Tutorial 1
resources.description: Bilibili frontend interview video tutorial explaining common interview questions and solutions.

resources.title: Frontend Interview Video Tutorial 2
resources.description: Another quality frontend interview video tutorial to help you better prepare for technical interviews.

tips.title: Interview Preparation Tips
items: Research the company and position requirements in advance, prepare related technical questions
Review basic knowledge, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript core concepts
Prepare project experience introduction, clearly explain project background, tech stack and personal contributions
Practice algorithm and programming problems to improve problem-solving speed and thinking
Prepare answers to common questions such as career planning, strengths and weaknesses
Maintain confidence and a positive attitude, demonstrate learning ability and problem-solving skills
